data.eml:eml: A new polystomatid (Monogenea, Polystomatidae) from the mouth of the North American freshwater turtle Pseudemysnelsoni

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Du Preez, Louis H., Van Rooyen, Michelle (2015): A new polystomatid (Monogenea, Polystomatidae) from the mouth of the North American freshwater turtle Pseudemysnelsoni. ZooKeys 539: 1-9, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.539.6108, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.539.6108
